a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Annual working hours vs. GDP per capita
Working hours are the annual average per worker. GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and differences in the cost of
Data source: Feenstra et al. (2015), Penn World Table (2021)
Note: This data is expressed in international-$ at 2017 prices, using multiple benchmark years to adjust for differences in the cost of living
